result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam John Bader

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Adam John Bader appeared by video.  Attorney Noah Buhle appeared by video for Adam John Bader.  Attorney Tristan Bednarek in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Pre-trial conference held. Defense counsel has discovery and requests a scheduling conference. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with KMB, and supervised contact with RRB

$500.00 cash previously posted to be returned to poster. 
The Court ordered No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Adam John Bader in court.  Attorney Noah Buhle in court for Adam John Bader.  Prosecuting attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt. 
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney. Defendant plead not guilty.  
Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 29.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on September 19th, 2022 @ 1:30pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on September 19th, 2022 @ 1:30pm.
